com.atmecs.falcon.automation.ui.seleniuminterfaces

Interface IMouseMove

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseMove

    public interface IMouseMove
    Any Mouse related actions can be performed by the methods provided by this Interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clickAndHold(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Purpose: Clicks (without releasing) at the current mouse location.
      boolean dragAndDrop(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement from, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement to)
      Purpose : Performs click-and-hold at the location of the source element, moves to the location of the target element, then releases the mouse.
      boolean dragAndDropBy(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement from, int x, int y)
      Purpose : Performs click-and-hold at the location of the source element, moves by a given offset, then releases the mouse.
      boolean mouseHover(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Purpose : This method will hover on web element of the web page
      boolean releaseElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Purpose: Releases the depressed left mouse button at the current mouse location

    • Method Detail

      • mouseHover

        boolean mouseHover(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Purpose : This method will hover on web element of the web page
        Parameters:
        element - : e.g find.findElementById("Home")
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • dragAndDrop

        boolean dragAndDrop(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement from,
                    org.openqa.selenium.WebElement to)
        Purpose : Performs click-and-hold at the location of the source element, moves to the location of the target element, then releases the mouse. source- element to emulate button down at. target- element to move to and release the mouse at.
        Parameters:
        from - : e.g find.findElementByLinkText("Shopping")
        to - : e.g find.findElementByLinkText("Private")
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • dragAndDropBy

        boolean dragAndDropBy(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement from,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        Purpose : Performs click-and-hold at the location of the source element, moves by a given offset, then releases the mouse.
        Parameters:
        from - : e.g WebElement from = find.findElementByLinkText("Shopping")
        x - : e.g 0
        y - : e.g 50
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • clickAndHold

        boolean clickAndHold(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Purpose: Clicks (without releasing) at the current mouse location.
        Parameters:
        element -
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • releaseElement

        boolean releaseElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Purpose: Releases the depressed left mouse button at the current mouse location
        Parameters:
        element -
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false
